# ion-skeleton-text

Skeleton Text is a component for rendering placeholder content. The element will render a gray block at the specified width.


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

#### width

string

Width for the element to render at. Default is 100%


## Attributes

#### width

string

Width for the element to render at. Default is 100%
